resources.string: Rebord yours old smatphone as real GPS Car Alarm system! Car Alarm is the best way to protect yours car, but not only! Pick up yours old smartphone insert into yours car et voil√†! Activate and deactivate it via bluetooth.
If checked Car Alarm will be started at boot up of yours smartphone, it\'s suggested.
If checked Car Alarm use the GPS for relevating position and send it if alarm ring.
If checked Car Alarm use accelerometer to detect shock or movements.
If checked Car Alarm send SMS is activated by GPS position or Accelerometer alert.
If checked is possible to activate/deactivate and test Car Alarm via remote bluetooth.
Click here to start or stop the service.
Check this if you want to make call on Alarm atcivated.
Use SMS to Activate/Deactivate Alarm: type \'activate\' to Activate Alarm or type \'deactivate\' to De-Activate Alarm
